properties.name: zcm.sdk.service.name
properties.description: Logical service name (map to spring.application.name & consul service)

properties.name: zcm.sdk.config.server.url
properties.description: Spring Cloud Config Server base URL (mapped to spring.config.import=configserver:...)

properties.name: zcm.sdk.discovery.provider
properties.description: Discovery provider (CONSUL or CONTROL). Default CONSUL

properties.name: zcm.sdk.bus.refresh.enabled
properties.description: Enable Kafka listener for config refresh

properties.name: zcm.sdk.bus.kafka.bootstrap-servers
properties.description: Kafka bootstrap servers for refresh listener

properties.name: zcm.sdk.kv.keycloak.token-endpoint
properties.description: Keycloak token endpoint URL for client credentials flow (e.g., http://keycloak:8080/realms/config-control/protocol/openid-connect/token)

properties.name: zcm.sdk.kv.keycloak.client-id
properties.description: Keycloak client ID for client credentials flow

properties.name: zcm.sdk.kv.keycloak.client-secret
properties.description: Keycloak client secret for client credentials flow

properties.name: zcm.sdk.api-key.enabled
properties.description: Enable API key authentication for SDK requests to config-control-service

properties.name: zcm.sdk.api-key.key
properties.description: API key value to send in X-API-Key header for authentication
